corn however there's a wide debate on raw diets and whether cooking all plant
based foods largely destroys the nutrients or not some of this
information comes from the work of dr. Kucha cough who conducted over 300

different types of food both cooked and raw however let us note that many of his
experiments had not ever been replicated and thus some of the findings are
questionable where others have been backed up a little bit more Kucha coughs
works seem to imply that if we consume a diet of mostly cooked food the immune
system in our bodies react to the food as if it
foreign invader he called this digestive leukocytosis where our bodies will
generate white blood cell activity against the food that we ate this is the
questionable part of this research which hasn't really been backed up the idea
was that because cooking the food destroys most of the enzymes our bodies
have to do all of the work to digest the food instead of working with the enzymes
within the food during the digestion process the body may very well have to
work harder but we can't say for certain it actually raises the alerts inside of
the body dr. kucho coughs work also found that every food has its own unique
cooking point which is called the critical temperature once food reaches
this critical temperature most of the essential nutrients are cooked away the
lowest critical temperature required to maintain the living enzymes in the food
does tend to change from food to food and mostly ranges between 87 to 97
degrees Celsius or 191 to 206 degrees Fahrenheit we've put a link at our
sources for you to see the specifics another study conducted by the Journal

losses of antioxidants were found in peas cauliflower and zucchini with

that heal instead of bring harm to our bodies we can overcome even the most
deadly of illnesses and all that is required is our desire to make it so and
take action upon that desire with that said there is one other method that we
would like to discuss to give our bodies a powerful boost of rejuvenation and
that is by consuming what today are called super foods super foods are
nutrient dense foods which contain an extremely large amount of vitamins
minerals and other essential nutrients they are most often plant-based food but
can include some fish and dairy too there is no official criteria for what
can and can't be a superfood but they're usually raw unprocessed and whole foods
that have significantly higher or more nutrients than other regular foods some
of the most popular superfoods include berries quinoa certain beans and nuts
and dark leafy greens like kale Swiss chard spinach and collards fish like
salmon sardines and mackerel are also considered to be superfoods in
that they contain a high amount of omega-3 fatty acid one of the most
notable qualities of superfood is their high level of antioxidants antioxidants
are molecules which protect the cells in the body from other harmful molecules
like free radicals one example study of this in particular showed that the
phenolic compounds of blueberries can actually inhibit colon cancer cell
growth some of the more uncommon but extremely powerful super foods include
ginseng goji berries buckwheat reishi mushrooms kelp wheatgrass spirulina hemp
seeds chia seeds flax seeds and raw cacao among that list spirulina is one
of the most notable super foods being 60% protein and containing a hefty dose
of vitamin A k1 k2 b12 iron manganese and chromium it has two hundred and
eighty percent more antioxidants than blueberries two thousand eight hundred
percent more beta-carotene than carrots and three thousand nine hundred percent
more iron than spinach it's seriously amazing rocket cow also has more than
300 phytochemicals in it nearly four times the antioxidant power of regular
dark chocolate containing protein calcium carotene thiamine riboflavin and
magnesium its uncompelled to regular store-bought chocolate which contains
next to none of the same nutrients due to being cooked generally superfoods are
regarded as powerful safeguards against chronic disease and have the potential
to prolong your life and support your body's healthy physique by lowering
cholesterol producing much needed enzymes inhibiting cancer causing cell
growth unclogging your arteries and so much more ultimately we always want to
